title: No disruptions in Parliament this time, INDIA bloc parties resolve
comments: I am really excited to see true democracy at play. Hopefully this sets a trend and isn't a one time exception!

> According to the sources, it was resolved during the detailed discussion that this is effectively the last chance the Opposition will get to speak in Parliament    

If the mic of opposition works or JBP member don't start a ruckus. They could have other tricks up their sleeve was well.
So a resolution has to adopted to not create a ruckus, implying that creating one is the norm and exceptions are to be made otherwise
It was a norm during previous government's rule itself.

Not saying any party/ collimation is the epitome of parliamentary decency, it's just that anti defection has ensured that parliamentary debates are less relevant and attention grabbing antics are becoming the norm which are a disgrace
Good. Hope the treasury respects that. They also contribute to over 50% of the ruckus
